review: Very cool idea but the technology is half baked, screen goes blank or stops while the sound continues (while not doing so on the computer) or the chrome cast comes back with an error message. This makes it difficult to enjoy watching a movie or TV show as you are constantly having to troubleshoot. Its easier to just plug and HDMI cable into my computer and enjoy watching on my TV uninterrupted.
author: Patrick McDaniel

review: Okay, I will admit that I bought this because I love gadgets.  When it comes down to it, I guess I don't know why I thought I needed it.  I have a PS3, which does my Netflix, Youtube, etc. more efficiently.  I never use this thing.  I will say this - it does what it is supposed to do, so if you need to stream Netflix or other things from your computer to your TV, it really does work.  I guess I didn't really need it though.

review: This is great for what I use it for, streaming videos from my computer/laptop/tablet/phone.
